title: font on sign
content:
Hello,

Please check out this font, i tried on whatthefont but no results. thanks in advance.

Cheers,  
Dan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829165134im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6052.jpg)

author: alpar

comments.content:
Excellent character in the lettering on this sign, presumably Austria, and after circa 1910. Don't know of a digital match, or a pre-digital for that matter.  
The style shows a mixture of influences, including Art Nouveau and the Arts & Crafts movement. Some of the fonts in this link might be of interest.  
 [http://www.identifont.com/list?3+P22%20Arts%20and%20Crafts%20Tall+0+7G4+...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829165134/http:/www.identifont.com/list?3+P22%20Arts%20and%20Crafts%20Tall+0+7G4+1+4PP+7+324+7+5GM+7+45W+7+EBH+7+DIM+7+2WI+7+8I4+7+44Z+7+1ZU+7+40M+7+40L+7+JC+7+A5J+7+3GW+7+6IK+7+6S4+7+6DN+7+NBL+8+7XQ+8+90W+8+CDW+8+359+8+4TS+8+4UJ+8+4UX+8+2EA6+8+4AE+8+OND+8 "http://www.identifont.com/list?3+P22%20Arts%20and%20Crafts%20Tall+0+7G4+1+4PP+7+324+7+5GM+7+45W+7+EBH+7+DIM+7+2WI+7+8I4+7+44Z+7+1ZU+7+40M+7+40L+7+JC+7+A5J+7+3GW+7+6IK+7+6S4+7+6DN+7+NBL+8+7XQ+8+90W+8+CDW+8+359+8+4TS+8+4UJ+8+4UX+8+2EA6+8+4AE+8+OND+8")  
Don

Thanks Don,

Yes its kind of Jugendstil font pretty hard to get it... Thanks for the information and the link!

Greetings

You're welcome Alfred. I should have made a specific mention of Jugendstil, which is after all the leading version of the influences of Art Nouveau and Arts & Crafts in Austria. So add to your list David Kerkhoff's new font Himmelblau [http://www.linotype.com/1247150/Himmelblau-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829165134/http:/www.linotype.com/1247150/Himmelblau-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/1247150/Himmelblau-family.html") Also designs from Eckmann & Behrens are worth a look.  
Don
